description:
The Falketind Thermo60 Hood is the most versatile synthetic insulation jacket made in recycled materials. It provides a great combination of light weight, packability, and insulation, and has a versatile design that works for all activities.

The recycled Pinecco insulation is not quilted which makes it soft and enables the full loft effect while still being very compressible. Due to the 3-layer construction of the insulation, it has good moisture wicking yet provides insulation even when wet. The recycled rip stop 20D nylon face fabric has PFC free DWR, and ensures that wind and some light rain won’t be standing between you and your new adventures. With mid mounted pockets your have easy access to your carry ons while wearing a backpack, and the stretchy cuffs and warm hood keep you protected and comfortable.

Other features include an inner pocket, articulated sleeves, adjustable hem and one hand adjustment on the hood. With its dynamic functionality it is a must in every outdoor wardrobe.
name: Norrona Falketind Thermo60 Hood - Mens
